<DOMAIN>BUSINESS-DEVELOPMENT</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT CONSULTANT
Career Focus
Self starter, customer focused and detail oriented business professional with multiple industry business development experience complemented by staffing industry, and Human Resources experience, specializing in business implementation and recruiting.
Proven track record of consistently exceeding corporate objectives and quotas.
Highly articulate and persuasive communicator able to reach individuals and groups from all organizational levels.
Ability to liaison between clients, Human Resources, sales and management.
Strong writing, editing, and presentation skills.
Extensive background in Networking, Building Customer Relations, Presentation, Sales & Marketing, Follow up, and Project Coordination.
Highly skilled strategic thinker, able to plan and implement client orientation program that achieve organizational objectives and business development goals.
Summary of Skills
Microsoft Office Programs, SharePoint, PeopleSoft, ADP Payroll, and Internet applications and Research.

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Human Resources
· Reduced employee turnover by 10% in one year.
Sales & Marketing
· Increased Accessory
World's revenue by 25% in less than 3 months.
Recruiting
· Developed recruiting plans, marketed, and hosted job fairs, which filled 120
hard to fill Building Inspector and Plans Examiner vacancies for The City of Houston's Permitting Center in
a period of six months, by sourcing and recruiting nationwide.
Business Development
· Promoted
to the largest territory for Workforce
Solutions, post exceeding market share and customer loyalty annual goals, in just over the first quarter of
the year in the second largest territory for the organization.
Business Management
· Implemented an attendance disclaimer, which
significantly decreased hiring event cancellations in current Workforce
Solutions Center.
Employee Engagement
· Earned 2nd highest fill rate in the
region for Workforce Solutions, by
improving quality of job postings, and actively encouraging Employment
Counselor and Staffing Specialist teams in aggressive recruitment efforts.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Business Development Consultant

01/2015 to Current
Provide Human Resources, Recruiting, Screening, and staffing services to employers in assigned areas.

Network through industry contacts, association memberships, and online.
Maintain an understanding of employment and business related activities in assigned areas by analyzing data to identify business development opportunities.
Understand clients' human resource-based needs and suggest appropriate products, provide advice, or otherwise address the issue.
Follow-up with clients to ensure effective delivery of services and products rendered.
Develop and process client contracts, renewals, and terminations.

Successful in advancing students reading level by 88% in a period of one school year.
Developed and taught lessons following the Voyager Instructional Model to improve students' reading skills.
Taught all aspects of Reading, English Literature, Grammar, and Writing.
Prepared students for the Florida's Comprehensive Assessment Test (FCAT).

Investigated, documented and resolved personnel issues and complaints at all levels within the hotel.
Conducted final interview, reviews, reprimands, and exit interviews in order to ensure all labor laws were followed.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Business Developer

Location: Philadelphia, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Business Developer
REMOTE POSITION: MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE USEvent and training company supporting Life Science industries is in search of a trade experienced business development professional.
 RESPONSIBILITIES:Business Development:* Develop new sales opportunities by executing sales strategies targeting new accounts fitting the Company Model.* Establish rapport to take a consultative approach to solving client problems. Earn prospect trust to learn their needs and provide a Company solution roadmap.* Present and demonstrate the value of Company solutions to qualified prospective clients; always positioning to close business.* Produce optimal proposal materials to clearly define the company’s value proposition as an impetus to contract new business.* Implement Business Plans to increase sales volume, and market share, expand relationships, and create referral opportunities.* Always contribute market insight for improved and expanded Company offerings.Execution and Revenue Generation:* Seek out, build, and maintain a targeted prospect list to pursue.* Meet and exceed Company sales objectives by adopting the Company methodology, including KPI adherence, exceeding activity targets.* Employ CRM for prospect development, activities tracking, forecasting, reporting, and accountability.* Prepare and negotiate agreements to optimize selling Gross Margins in consultation with the team.Post-Sale Responsibilities:* Work with Processing, Finance, Education & Training teams to transition new clients to the company process.* Collaborate with internal staff to resolve any issues related to implementation or support,* Leverage key accounts or partner relationships for additional sales and referrals.* Perform impactful Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR) with key clients to ensure satisfaction and uncover additional opportunities.* Provide feedback to Senior Management regarding ways to decrease the sales cycle, enhance sales, and/or improve the Company’s brand and reputation.* Provide ongoing market perspective by monitoring competitors, attending conferences (e.g., LTEN), and participating in campaigns.* Represent Company professionally and effectively and function as an ambassador for the brand at all times including conferences, professional organizations, and networking events as well as all internal interactions.REQUIREMENTS:* Bachelor’s degree in Sales, Communication or Business or related field* 3-5 years’ proven successful sales experience in Life Sciences industry.* Comprehensive and current knowledge of industry offerings and trends* Outstanding knowledge of MS Office; knowledge of CRM software* Soft skills: Motivated, skilled influencer and negotiator; excellent interpersonal skills, strong communication skills, ability to effectively lead and interact with multiple disciplines/departments; solid relationship-building skills; superior customer service skills.

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
